<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_security_acl"><sys_security_acl action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><admin_overrides>true</admin_overrides><advanced>true</advanced><condition table="x_565129_snow_eval_suggestions.u_short_description">u_suggested_byDYNAMIC90d1921e5f510100a9ad2572f2b477fe^EQ<item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></condition><description>Allow write for u_short_description in x_565129_snow_eval_suggestions, for users with role public, and if the ACL script returns true, and if the ACL condition (u_suggested_byDYNAMIC90d1921e5f510100a9ad2572f2b477fe^EQ) evaluates to true.</description><name>x_565129_snow_eval_suggestions.u_short_description</name><operation display_value="write">write</operation><script><![CDATA[var answer = false;
var loggedIn  = gs.getUserID();
if(loggedIn)
  answer = true;]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_security_acl</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-02-15 09:37:49</sys_created_on><sys_id>e1da861a2f12e01080862ea62799b6cf</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_565129_snow_eval_suggestions.u_short_description</sys_name><sys_package display_value="SNOW Evaluation" source="x_565129_snow_eval">28ccbb982fd6201080862ea62799b642</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SNOW Evaluation">28ccbb982fd6201080862ea62799b642</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_security_acl_e1da861a2f12e01080862ea62799b6cf</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-02-15 09:47:13</sys_updated_on><type display_value="record">record</type></sys_security_acl></record_update>
